formula: a(n) ~ (n-1)! * (-1)^(n+1) * 2^(n+1) / (exp(Pi/2) * Pi^n). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 23 2015a(n) = Sum_{j=0..n-1}(-1)^j*binomial(n,j+1)*A000111(j). - _Robert Israel_, Aug 06 2015
